title: The program panic if --downloader.verify is added
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2.28.1-stable-9711af6d`

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash : 9711af6d

````
root@Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base ~ # erigon --chain=bsc --port=30411 --http.api=eth,web3,net --v5disc --torrent.upload.rate=32mb --torrent.download.rate=25000mb  --db.pagesize=16k --prune= --prune.r.before=16000000 --prune.h.older=5000 --prune.t.older=5000 --prune.c.older=5000 --verbosity 3 --downloader.verify
INFO[10-21|23:26:50.700] Build info                               git_branch=HEAD git_tag=v2.28.1 git_commit=9711af6ddf01f1eb96c9dfb7bf33c5d69e6f648a
INFO[10-21|23:26:50.700] Starting Erigon on BSC mainnet... 
INFO[10-21|23:26:50.704] Maximum peer count                       ETH=100 total=100
INFO[10-21|23:26:50.704] starting HTTP APIs                       APIs=eth,web3,net
INFO[10-21|23:26:50.704] torrent verbosity                        level=WRN
INFO[10-21|23:26:52.807] Set global gas cap                       cap=50000000
INFO[10-21|23:26:52.815] Opening Database                         label=chaindata path=/root/.local/share/erigon/chaindata
INFO[10-21|23:26:52.817] Initialised chain configuration          config="{ChainID: 56 Ramanujan: 0, Niels: 0, MirrorSync: 5184000, Bruno: 13082000, Euler: 18907621, Gibbs: <nil>, Nano: 21962149, Moran: 22107423, Engine: parlia}" genesis=0x0d21840abff46b96c84b2ac9e10e4f5cdaeb5693cb665db62a2f3b02d2d57b5b
INFO[10-21|23:26:52.817] Effective                                prune_flags="--prune.h.older=5000 --prune.r.before=16000000 --prune.t.older=5000 --prune.c.older=5000" snapshot_flags="--snapshots=true" history.v3=false
INFO[10-21|23:26:53.895] Initialising Ethereum protocol           network=56
INFO[10-21|23:26:54.287] Starting private RPC server              on=127.0.0.1:9090
INFO[10-21|23:26:54.287] new subscription to logs established 
INFO[10-21|23:26:54.287] rpc filters: subscribing to Erigon events 
INFO[10-21|23:26:54.288] New txs subscriber joined 
INFO[10-21|23:26:54.288] new subscription to newHeaders established 
INFO[10-21|23:26:54.288] Reading JWT secret                       path=/root/.local/share/erigon/jwt.hex
INFO[10-21|23:26:54.288] HTTP endpoint opened for Engine API      url=localhost:8551 ws=true ws.compression=true
INFO[10-21|23:26:54.288] HTTP endpoint opened                     url=localhost:8545 ws=false ws.compression=true grpc=false
INFO[10-21|23:26:54.302] [1/16 Snapshots] Fetching torrent files metadata 
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x10 pc=0x13932f6]

goroutine 4913 [running]:
github.com/anacrolix/torrent/metainfo.(*Info).NumPieces(...)
        github.com/anacrolix/torrent@v1.47.0/metainfo/info.go:134
github.com/anacrolix/torrent.(*Torrent).numPieces(...)
        github.com/anacrolix/torrent@v1.47.0/torrent.go:857
github.com/anacrolix/torrent.(*Torrent).NumPieces(...)
        github.com/anacrolix/torrent@v1.47.0/t.go:84
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cmd/downloader/downloader.(*Downloader).verify.func1(0xc00d0a0000)
        github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cmd/downloader/downloader/downloader.go:206 +0xb6
created by github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cmd/downloader/downloader.(*Downloader).verify
        github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cmd/downloader/downloader/downloader.go:204 +0x17c

````

start without --downloader.verify


> fixing by #5833

thank you for your help
